metadata.name: Every Curse
metadata.description:
This mod makes every single floor in the game have each curseL. Except for Hush, Womb II, Void, Depths II (though in a regular run you can't reach Depths II/Womb II without using we need to go deeper, but removed just in case) Greedier, and Challenge mode as that crashes or softlocks the game. I also made black candle a random item.)
Enjoy : )
